string.text: Now, there will be more battles in the Arena, will close up shop and go to seek happiness in other climes?
Wait, Bullseye, it is not necessary to do hasty conclusions, it was only one tournament of many.
Strange, but for some reason I thought so from the beginning. Come on, show your hand.

So, this time you won and became the Champion of the Arena, but this is simply passing title and it does not guarantee that the next tournament will you play in the box. Tournaments are held more or less regularly - once or twice a day, fighting from 22:00 to 06:00, the opening of the Arena will know of the messages that I will transmit a common channel. Until you're the champion you have full access by selecting all the announced fights - this means only you decide with whom, what, and in what order to fight. Only here about the weapons there are a few restrictions - you cannot use any explosive charges and grenades, heavy weapons, RG-6, RPG-7 and a Gauss gun. That is all, now Arena needs a little clean up, so while you can go to a bar and get drunk, just don't miss the opening, see you soon.
Oh, how impatient, even participants little drunk, come back later.
No luck - better luck next time.
Great fight! You earned your reward and bonus.
The penalty for violation of the rules of the battle.

What's Up, Champ! Decided again to look at the arena. Offer have not yet found a worthy contender to take away your title, not to relax and continue playing. How about to soak a couple of mutants? Just fresh caught.
Bullseye, look, you've got a small problem. The warring factions decided to unite to fight the common enemy.
Only that this enemy is you. Try to remember how many people have you sent the arena into the light? Here are the rest and refuse to fight you... one at a time.
Great, Bullseye. Hey, we got the last time animals had accumulated so much that had nowhere to go. And as evil, no they do not want to fight. Can you undertake?
Think about it, it's good. And we'll help himself earn.
Great, Bullseye. arena''s open again, come on pick a fight, today we have as always a very intense program.
Turn me again to your mailing list.
You can send me your messages?
Simply cross out your PDA from the list.
You're the light in the arena more to include?
Then turn on, then off. You better define.
All for today - wanting more gone.

If you are confident, we can offer timed fights. These battles are short and require considerable skill. There is a chance to receive a bonus or even double the winnings, if you keep within the allotted time. Remember one rule - you can not kill the enemies after switching the timer runs out - the penalty: a fine equal to the reward. It is better not to get the reward and not be fined, and the living soldiers I still have in other speeches come in handy. How long on the timer?
No one, I changed my mind.
Some other time - in pockets were empty.
Bets - bets are no longer accepted.

Want to earn money without risking your life? Then you came to the right place. Can bet on two types: Mutant fights and Tournament groups. It's simple - tell me who you choose, pay, and watch the fight, if you win you get back your money plus interest, if you lose, at least you got to watch. Which do you choose?
Finally, mutant Duty has resumed deliveries, even rare ones. Choose your victim.

It would seem that what they do in the Bar, but due to extensive connections with the command of the military, Doljane can afford even that. Their professionalism and experience make them a tough opponent. Armed with the best domestic guns.

Mercenaries - a well-organized PMC with imported weapons, rumored to work for foreign governments. The Locals dislike them, and they are generally like a bone in the throat, but the power of this organization makes everyone reckon with their presence in the zone.

Freedom - irreconcilable enemies of Duty. During battles enjoy immunity in the Bar. In their ranks there are many who refused the ideology of Duty, and therefore, have tense relations. Although Duty believes that Freedom are anarchists, they are nevertheless formidable, with excellent weapons and equipment.

Duty - our self-proclaimed cops. It was their idea to have battles in the arena. Duty members regularly take part in battle, honing their fighting skills to prepare for raids. Armed state forces, samples of domestic military weaponry.
The usual stalkers that do not belong to any faction. Perhaps some have crossed your path - there is a good reason to deal with competitors. Varied weapons, but in poor quality.
Another batch of suicide bombers from the Dark valley. Their weapons are trash.
A mixed-faction team. The total number is slightly higher than usual. And they are determined to avenge the deaths of their comrades.
The odds are slim, are you sure? Better figure it out now than in the arena.
Here the stalkers from the different factions battle with mutants. What do you decide?
Tournament of prestige between groups, each trying to demonstrate their superiority over others. Issues are often resolved here. The rules are simple: last team standing wins. Shall we?
Arena is closed for cleaning. No more fights today.
Battle finished, the arena was closed for maintenance. If you missed it, too late.
Arena is open again! Who wants to take the first litre of blood?
Anyone wishing to participate in the arena, come to the bar quickly. The first battle will take place in 3 hours.
Six hours until the arena opens.
Twelve hours until the arena opens.
Reminder: fighting in the arena will resume in 24 hours.
The arena opens in 48 hours, participants accepted.
Three days until the arena opens.
Guys, some bastard killed Arnie!!! If anyone finds this beast, shoot him on the spot. A reward is offered. At the moment arena is closed indefinitely, so stay tuned.
There was a new administrator, the arena will soon be restored.
What the fuck is that, again, some of the scum got the administrator of the arena! Someone finally stop this rabid animal?
Hey, you asshole, if I know your name... better shoot yourself, don't wait when you come for my boys - they'll will be a long torment.
All the stalkers in the Bar, killed the Manager of the arena. Looking for a killer, it is time to stop this mess once and for all.

Guys, again she copytele Manager of the arena, the killer is still somewhere nearby. Find him, but not kill, just prelolita all the bones and throw to die in a fire. After the Debt will hang the remains of this filth on one of the trees at the entrance to the Bar.

Here's the thing... Arnie the drunk flew into the anomaly... well I tore it up, even the bones remained. So, you know, guys, fighting in the arena until. As soon As there new Manager - give information on the common channel.

Damn it, had disappeared, the new administrator of the arena. If anybody sees this akasha, immediately drag him to the bar, though most likely later, probably perished in the anomaly or some trouble happened... In any case, arena will not open until you will not find a Manager. Thank you - all sobotni.
Went to a bar to guzzle vodka. Before the opening not to turn over.
Went to a bar to drink away your money, losers.
If anyone need, look for me in the bar, but I warn you immediately, without a bottle will not talk.
Oh, day after day the same thing... all vodka, vodka... well I'm at the bar.
